title: Chacha Vidhayak Hain Humare
overview: Ronny's whole life is based on a lie. To the world he is the nephew of the MLA and a wanna be youth leader who solves people's problems. But in reality, Ronny is a jobless 26 year old with no relation to the MLA who shares his surname. The show explores Ronny's adventures as he gets stuck in multiple situations because of this lie.
